title: BRIEF-CME Says ‍Working With NEX To Determine Whether Firm Offer Can Be Made​
text: March 16, 2018 / 2:14 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-CME Says ‍Working With NEX To Determine Whether Firm Offer Can Be Made​ Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - CME Group Inc: * ‍CME AND NEX CURRENTLY ARE WORKING TOGETHER TO ALLOW CME TO COMPLETE DUE DILIGENCE ​ * STATEMENT RE POSSIBLE OFFER * ‍CME AND NEX CURRENTLY ARE WORKING TOGETHER TO DETERMINE WHETHER A FIRM OFFER CAN BE MADE​ * ‍CME IS REQUIRED, BY NOT LATER THAN 5.00 P.M. ON APRIL 12, 2018, TO EITHER ANNOUNCE A FIRM INTENTION TO MAKE AN OFFER OR NOT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
